body:
What Is This?
Every other day, I will ask 3 questions to the Forumers!

How Did You Come Up With This?
SnowGolem inspired me to try it out!

Will You Split These Up?
Yes, every other day I will make a Topic, or "episode", asking 3 questions.

Lets Get Started!

When you first saw Minecraft, did you like it?

What other games do you play?

How did you find out about Avicus?

title: Answer These Questions! PILOT EPISODE

replies.body:
When you first saw Minecraft, did you like it? NO, I still hate minecraft, only play it for the pvp

What other games do you play? uhmm...Smite maybe, I'm not that into videogames

How did you find out about Avicus? Jozzmcozz

When you first saw Mineraft, Did u like it? Yes
  1. I don't play other games
  2. I saw it on a minecraft server website

replies.body: Can I submit a map for Nebula
replies.body_tagged: Can I submit a map for Nebula

replies.body:
1.) Actually, no I didn't. When my brother first showed me it I thought it was just some stupid game, but when I actually tried the demo of it, I loved it. 
2.) None, anymore. I sorta grew out of video games. I used to play a lot of NBA 2K14 though.
3.) I found MCZone when I was looking for a good HG server on the minecraft server list. I had tried out some other servers, but for some reason, I stuck with MCZone. (This was back when they had that lobby where you were the only player in it, and when there was only Nebula, Walls, and HG)

replies.body: Cinna, not an AMA ;D i guess il change the title!
replies.body_tagged: Cinna, not an AMA ;D i guess il change the title!

replies.body:
Oh wait, I'm dumb x3

When you first saw Minecraft, did you like it?
No actually, I thought it was a very pointless game and (lol) a ripoff of Roblox.
Then I decided to play it and the addiction settled in. Oh well :P

What other games do you play?
Pokemon, Mario (including spin-offs,) Legend of Zelda, Super Smash Bros (64, Brawl, Project M,) Team Fortress 2, Dark Souls (and 2,) etc.

How did you find out about Avicus?
My friend showed it to me while it was still McZone, and the first thing I played was Skywars. It will be forever missed <3
